entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
